properties.value:
#Variable NameVariable IDVariable Description
1PX030501_Alcohol_Withdrawal_ShakePX030501130100People who cut down, stop, or go without drinking after drinking steadily for some time may not feel well. These feelings are more intense and can last longer than the usual hangover. When you stopped, cut down or went without drinking, did you ever experience any of the following problems for most of the day for 2 days or longer? Did you have the shakes (hands trembling)?
2PX030501_Alcohol_Withdrawal_SleeplessPX030501130200People who cut down, stop, or go without drinking after drinking steadily for some time may not feel well. These feelings are more intense and can last longer than the usual hangover. When you stopped, cut down or went without drinking, did you ever experience any of the following problems for most of the day for 2 days or longer? Were you unable to sleep?
3PX030501_Alcohol_Withdrawal_AnxiousPX030501130300People who cut down, stop, or go without drinking after drinking steadily for some time may not feel well. These feelings are more intense and can last longer than the usual hangover. When you stopped, cut down or went without drinking, did you ever experience any of the following problems for most of the day for 2 days or longer? Did you feel anxious?
4PX030501_Alcohol_Withdrawal_DepressedPX030501130400People who cut down, stop, or go without drinking after drinking steadily for some time may not feel well. These feelings are more intense and can last longer than the usual hangover. When you stopped, cut down or went without drinking, did you ever experience any of the following problems for most of the day for 2 days or longer? Did you feel depressed or irritable?
5PX030501_Alcohol_Withdrawal_HeartRacingPX030501130500People who cut down, stop, or go without drinking after drinking steadily for some time may not feel well. These feelings are more intense and can last longer than the usual hangover. When you stopped, cut down or went without drinking, did you ever experience any of the following problems for most of the day for 2 days or longer? Did your heart beat fast or did you sweat?
6PX030501_Alcohol_Withdrawal_NauseaPX030501130600People who cut down, stop, or go without drinking after drinking steadily for some time may not feel well. These feelings are more intense and can last longer than the usual hangover. When you stopped, cut down or went without drinking, did you ever experience any of the following problems for most of the day for 2 days or longer? Did you have nausea or vomiting?
7PX030501_Alcohol_Withdrawal_WeakPX030501130700People who cut down, stop, or go without drinking after drinking steadily for some time may not feel well. These feelings are more intense and can last longer than the usual hangover. When you stopped, cut down or went without drinking, did you ever experience any of the following problems for most of the day for 2 days or longer? Did you feel physically weak?
8PX030501_Alcohol_Withdrawal_HeadachesPX030501130800People who cut down, stop, or go without drinking after drinking steadily for some time may not feel well. These feelings are more intense and can last longer than the usual hangover. When you stopped, cut down or went without drinking, did you ever experience any of the following problems for most of the day for 2 days or longer? Did you have headaches?
9PX030501_Alcohol_Withdrawal_HallucinationPX030501130900People who cut down, stop, or go without drinking after drinking steadily for some time may not feel well. These feelings are more intense and can last longer than the usual hangover. When you stopped, cut down or went without drinking, did you ever experience any of the following problems for most of the day for 2 days or longer? Did you see or hear things that weren't there?
10PX030501_Alcohol_Withdrawal_RestlessPX030501131000People who cut down, stop, or go without drinking after drinking steadily for some time may not feel well. These feelings are more intense and can last longer than the usual hangover. When you stopped, cut down or went without drinking, did you ever experience any of the following problems for most of the day for 2 days or longer? Were you fidgety or restless?

LOINC_NUM: 63627-4
COMPONENT: When you stopped, cut down or went without drinking, did you ever experience this problem for most of the day for 2D or longer
